description: Turba Agroecologia is a cooperative dedicated to producing agroecological wholemeal flour while providing technical support to producers transitioning to sustainable practices. Our initiative aims to promote food sustainability by restoring soil fertility and ensuring safe, healthy food for both producers and consumers. We strive for long-term sustainability, expanding our reach and product offerings, despite challenges in formalizing production and accessing necessary resources.
name: Turba Agroecologia
